languages.text: "Претендент, обещавший вернуться с трофеем, что возвышает смертного над другими — реликвией, что может послужить Пределу рассвета..." {n}Знакомые слова всплывают в вашей памяти, словно голоса не потрудились повторить их, а их зачерпнули из ваших воспоминаний.{/n} "Судьба была предначертана, шаги — определены. И все же... ты нарушил{mf||а} нерушимое. Претендент потерпел поражение — и дал рождение новому кандидату".

"The aspirant vowed to return with a trophy, to procure that which elevates a mortal above others — a relic that could serve the Edge of Daybreak..." {n}Those familiar words resurface in your mind as if the voices have pulled them directly from your memory.{/n} "That fate was assured and the steps chosen. And yet... you broke the unbreakable. The aspirant was defeated, and thus gave birth to a new aspirant."
languages.original_text: "Претендент, обещавший вернуться с трофеем, что возвышает смертного над другими — реликвией, что может послужить Пределу рассвета..." {n}Знакомые слова всплывают в вашей памяти, словно голоса не потрудились повторить их, а их зачерпнули из ваших воспоминаний.{/n} "Судьба была предначертана, шаги — определены. И все же... ты нарушил{mf||а} нерушимое. Претендент потерпел поражение — и дал рождение новому кандидату".

traits.locale_text: "The challenger who promised to return with a trophy that elevates a mortal above everyone else, a relic that can serve the Edge of Daybreak..." {n}Familiar words resurface in your mind as if the voices didn't care to tell them, but instead, took them from your memory.{/n} "The destiny was set, the steps were defined, and yet... you broke what shall not be broken. The challenger faced failure and thus gave birth to a new candidate."

"The challenger who promised to return with a trophy that elevates a mortal above everyone else, a relic that can serve the Edge of Daybreak..." {n}Familiar words resurface in your mind as if the voices didn't care to tell them, but instead, took them from your memory.{/n} "The destiny was set, the steps were defined, and yet... you broke what shall not be broken. The challenger faced failure and thus gave birth to a new candidate."

"The challenger who promised to return with a trophy that elevates a mortal above all else, a relic that can serve the Edge of Daybreak..." {n}Those familiar words resurface in your mind as if the voices snatched them directly from your memory.{/n} "Your destiny was set, your path was marked, and yet... you broke what shall not be broken. The challenger has failed and has thus made room for a new one."

"The challenger who promised to return with a trophy that elevates a mortal above all else, a relic that can serve the Edge of Daybreak..." {n}Those familiar words resurface in your mind as if the voices snatched them directly from your memory.{/n} "Your destiny was set, your path was marked, and yet... you broke what shall not be broken. The challenger has failed and has thus made room for a new one."

"The aspirant vowed to return with a trophy, to procure that which elevates a mortal above others — a relic that could serve the Edge of Daybreak..." {n}Those familiar words resurface in your mind as if the voices have pulled them directly from your memory.{/n} "That fate was assured and the steps chosen. And yet... you broke the unbreakable. The aspirant was defeated, and thus gave birth to a new aspirant."

languages.text: “渴望擢升之人，发誓会带着战利品回来。那件战利品会让凡人超越一切，那件遗物会侍奉破晓锋刃……”{n}熟悉的话语再次浮现在你的脑海中，仿佛那些声音是直接从你的记忆中浮现的。{/n}“命运已经编织，旅途已然开始，然而……你打破了无法打破的东西。原本的挑战者失败了，新的挑战者开辟了道路。”
languages.original_text: "The aspirant vowed to return with a trophy, to procure that which elevates a mortal above others — a relic that could serve the Edge of Daybreak..." {n}Those familiar words resurface in your mind as if the voices have pulled them directly from your memory.{/n} "That fate was assured and the steps chosen. And yet... you broke the unbreakable. The aspirant was defeated, and thus gave birth to a new aspirant."

traits.locale_text: “渴望擢升之人，发誓会带着战利品回来。那件战利品会让凡人超越一切，那件遗物会侍奉破晓锋刃……”{n}熟悉的话语再次浮现在你的脑海中，仿佛那些声音是直接从你的记忆中浮现的。{/n}“命运已经编织，旅途已然开始，然而……你打破了无法打破的东西。原本的挑战者失败了，新的挑战者开辟了道路。”

languages.text: « Le prétendant avait juré de revenir avec un trophée, d'obtenir ce qui élève un mortel au-dessus de ses semblables : une relique qui pourrait servir la Lame de l'Aube... » {n}Ces mots familiers resurgissent dans votre esprit comme si les voix les avaient tirés directement de vos souvenirs.{/n} « Ce destin était garanti et les étapes, choisies. Pourtant... vous avez brisé ce qui ne pouvait l'être. Le prétendant a été vaincu, donnant ainsi naissance à {mf|un successeur|une successeure}. »
languages.original_text: "The aspirant vowed to return with a trophy, to procure that which elevates a mortal above others — a relic that could serve the Edge of Daybreak..." {n}Those familiar words resurface in your mind as if the voices have pulled them directly from your memory.{/n} "That fate was assured and the steps chosen. And yet... you broke the unbreakable. The aspirant was defeated, and thus gave birth to a new aspirant."

traits.locale_text: « Le prétendant avait juré de revenir avec un trophée, d'obtenir ce qui élève un mortel au-dessus de ses semblables : une relique qui pourrait servir la Lame de l'Aube... » {n}Ces mots familiers resurgissent dans votre esprit comme si les voix les avaient tirés directement de vos souvenirs.{/n} « Ce destin était garanti et les étapes, choisies. Pourtant... vous avez brisé ce qui ne pouvait l'être. Le prétendant a été vaincu, donnant ainsi naissance à {mf|un successeur|une successeure}. »

languages.text: 「志願者は、戦利品を持って戻ると誓った。人間を他の者よりも高めるもの、つまり 『夜明けのエッジ 』に役立つ遺物を手に入れるために…」{n}その聞き覚えのある言葉は、あなたの脳内に直接語り掛けるかのように記憶をよみがえらせた。{/n}「その運命は確かなものであり、選ばれた道だった。なのに…あなたは破れないものを破った。志士は敗れ、新たな志士が誕生したのです」
languages.original_text: "The aspirant vowed to return with a trophy, to procure that which elevates a mortal above others — a relic that could serve the Edge of Daybreak..." {n}Those familiar words resurface in your mind as if the voices have pulled them directly from your memory.{/n} "That fate was assured and the steps chosen. And yet... you broke the unbreakable. The aspirant was defeated, and thus gave birth to a new aspirant."

traits.locale_text: 「志願者は、戦利品を持って戻ると誓った。人間を他の者よりも高めるもの、つまり 『夜明けのエッジ 』に役立つ遺物を手に入れるために…」{n}その聞き覚えのある言葉は、あなたの脳内に直接語り掛けるかのように記憶をよみがえらせた。{/n}「その運命は確かなものであり、選ばれた道だった。なのに…あなたは破れないものを破った。志士は敗れ、新たな志士が誕生したのです」

languages.text: «El aspirante juró volver con un trofeo, obtener algo que eleva a un mortal sobre los demás: una reliquia que podría servir al Filo del Amanecer...». {n}Las palabras resuenan en tu mente como si las voces las arrancaran de tus recuerdos.{/n} «Ese destino estaba asegurado, y los pasos necesarios habían sido trazados. Pero... rompiste lo inquebrantable. El aspirante fue derrotado, dando paso a un{mf||a} nuev{mf|o|a} aspirante».
languages.original_text: "The aspirant vowed to return with a trophy, to procure that which elevates a mortal above others — a relic that could serve the Edge of Daybreak..." {n}Those familiar words resurface in your mind as if the voices have pulled them directly from your memory.{/n} "That fate was assured and the steps chosen. And yet... you broke the unbreakable. The aspirant was defeated, and thus gave birth to a new aspirant."

traits.locale_text: «El aspirante juró volver con un trofeo, obtener algo que eleva a un mortal sobre los demás: una reliquia que podría servir al Filo del Amanecer...». {n}Las palabras resuenan en tu mente como si las voces las arrancaran de tus recuerdos.{/n} «Ese destino estaba asegurado, y los pasos necesarios habían sido trazados. Pero... rompiste lo inquebrantable. El aspirante fue derrotado, dando paso a un{mf||a} nuev{mf|o|a} aspirante».

languages.text: "Der Aspirant schwor, mit einer Trophäe zurückzukehren, etwas zu beschaffen, das Sterbliche über andere erhebt – ein Relikt in Diensten des Randes des Tagesanbruchs ..." {n}Diese vertrauten Worte kommen dir wieder in den Sinn, als hätten die Stimmen sie geradewegs aus deinem Gedächtnis gepflückt.{/n} "Dieses Schicksal wurde gewährleistet, die Schritte dafür wurden gewählt. Und dennoch ... habt Ihr das Unzerbrechliche zerbrochen. Der Aspirant wurde besiegt und gebar damit {mf|einen Nachfolger|eine Nachfolgerin}."
languages.original_text: "The aspirant vowed to return with a trophy, to procure that which elevates a mortal above others — a relic that could serve the Edge of Daybreak..." {n}Those familiar words resurface in your mind as if the voices have pulled them directly from your memory.{/n} "That fate was assured and the steps chosen. And yet... you broke the unbreakable. The aspirant was defeated, and thus gave birth to a new aspirant."

Und dennoch ... habt Ihr das Unzerbrechliche zerbrochen. Der Aspirant wurde besiegt und gebar damit {mf|einen Nachfolger|eine Nachfolgerin}."

languages.text: "Talip, yanında bir ölümlüyü diğerlerinden üstün kılan bir ganimetle dönmeye ant içmişti. Tan Vakti'ne hizmet edebilecek bir yadigâr bulacaktı... {n}Bu tanıdık sözler, sesler sanki onları hafızandan çekmiş gibi zihninde yankılanıyor.{/n} "Bu kader belirlenmiş, atılacak adımlar seçilmişti... Lakin sen devrilmez olanı devirdin. Talibin yenilmesi, yeni bir talibi doğurdu."
languages.original_text: "The aspirant vowed to return with a trophy, to procure that which elevates a mortal above others — a relic that could serve the Edge of Daybreak..." {n}Those familiar words resurface in your mind as if the voices have pulled them directly from your memory.{/n} "That fate was assured and the steps chosen. And yet... you broke the unbreakable. The aspirant was defeated, and thus gave birth to a new aspirant."
